mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUMMARY_INFO( summary_id, complaint_main_id, summary_emp, summary_time, summary, filing_time, file_number, handle_people, handle_time, next_link, next_link_man, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{summaryId}, #{complaintMainId}, #{summaryEmp}, #{summaryTime}, #{summary}, #{filingTime}, #{fileNumber}, #{handlePeople}, #{handleTime}, #{nextLink}, #{nextLinkMan}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
